name: bekindlytodaybackend
description: The backend for the bekindlytoday app

scripts.spin-db: . ./.env.dev && docker build --target dev -t bkt_db_img_dev ./db && docker run -dp 5432:5432 -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=$POSTGRES_PASSWORD --name db_c bkt_db_img_dev
scripts.kill-db: docker stop db_c && docker rm db_c
scripts.docker-dev: docker compose --env-file ./.env.dev up --detach && docker compose --env-file ./.env.dev watch

author: BeKindly Backend Team
